title: Responsive Design Audit & Fix
description: Audit and fix all responsive issues. App must render correctly on iPhone SE (375px), iPhone 14 (390px), Pixel 7 (412px), iPad (768px), and Desktop (1280px+).
acceptance_criteria: Consistent breakpoints defined: sm (640), md (768), lg (1024), xl (1280)
All grid layouts reflow correctly: 1 col mobile, 2 col tablet, 3 col desktop
Font scaling uses clamp() or responsive scale — no text overflow
No horizontal scroll on any device at any viewport
Cards, modals, and forms work on all breakpoints
Header and navigation responsive (hamburger on mobile if needed)
Bubble selector works on small screens
files_to_touch: All component files with layout classes
src/components/ (audit all grid and flex usage)
completion_summary:
Audited all 12 component files and App.tsx. Found and fixed 7 responsive issues:

1. MasterListDrawer.tsx: Fixed w-96 (384px) overflowing iPhone SE (375px) viewport — changed to w-full sm:w-96. This was the only true horizontal-scroll bug.

2. TaskList.tsx (edit form): grid-cols-4 on a 375px screen made 4 inputs unreadably cramped — changed to grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-4.

3. VoucherCard.tsx: Action buttons (Edit/Delete/Refresh) were opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100, invisible on touch devices — removed hover-gating, always visible.

4. ShoppingList.tsx header: Added min-w-0 flex-1 to left container, flex-shrink-0 to right, truncate + text-2xl sm:text-3xl to title — prevents long list names from overflowing.

5. TaskList.tsx header: Same fix as ShoppingList — min-w-0, flex-shrink-0, truncate, responsive text.

6. VoucherList.tsx header: Same fix + flex-shrink-0 on Add Voucher button. Also removed debug 'List ID: ...' from production UI.

7. VouchersHub.tsx: Reduced gap-6 (24px) → gap-4 (16px) between back arrow and title; made heading text-2xl sm:text-3xl. ShoppingHub and TasksHub headings also made responsive.

8. App.tsx landing cards: Reduced padding from p-12 to p-8 sm:p-12, icon size from 64 to 48 (sm:64 via CSS), text from text-3xl to text-xl sm:text-3xl — prevents text overflow on 80vw cards at 375px.

All changes verified with npx tsc --noEmit (zero errors). Tailwind breakpoints confirmed correct (sm:640, md:768, lg:1024, xl:1280 — Tailwind defaults, no override needed). RTL logical properties (ms-/me-) used where applicable.
notes: Use Chrome DevTools device mode to test. Focus on the worst offenders first. Take before/after screenshots for documentation.
